Articles.Content:
Anyone know of a list anywhere of stock parts that I can stuff a Kerbal into? There seem to be some in different sections of the VAB lists. I'm working on my first station and don't want it to be cosmetic, want to design a habitat.

Also, if there are any must-have mods for inhabitable space stations let me know (there are so many parts mods).

Well, other than the stuff in the Command Pods tab, there's only the hitchhiker module, which is under Utilities. Other than that, there's no places for Kerbals to go.

As for habitable space station bits, there's always this greenhouse part, which has been floating around here lately. There's plenty more awesome station parts, but here's something to start you off.

http://www./download/jbxl5xj6t3uyosx/z_greenhouse.7z

Edited July 25, 2013 by Sapphire
